channel.title: HeLP?

item.title: HeLP?
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

Nope But Im gonna add the public int maxPC’s cause that is the only thing i dont have
i knew it wasn’t declared i just didn’t know where to declare it

Read full topic

item.title: HeLP?
item.dc:creator: @Moparsuck Moparsuck
item.description:
@Moparsuck wrote:

It means maxNPCs is not declared.

For me it is here in the NPCHandler.java,
where it sais “public static int maxNPCs = 10000;” does yours have this?

public class NPCHandler {
public static int maxNPCs = 10000;
public static int maxListedNPCs = 10000;
public static int maxNPCDrops = 10000;
public NPC npcs[] = new NPC[maxNPCs];
public NPCList NpcList[] = new NPCList[maxListedNPCs];
public NPCDrops NpcDrops[] = new NPCDrops[maxNPCDrops];
public void checkBarrows(int npc) {
if (npcs[npc].npcType >= 2025 && npcs[npc].npcType <= 2037) {
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(npc)];
c.killcount++;
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: HeLP?
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

Now I get this.client.java:1659: cannot find symbol symbol : variable maxNPCs location: class NPCHandler for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs - 1; i++) { ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
FIXED: Now I get thisclient.java:1659: operator - cannot be applied to NPC[],int for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.npcs - 1; i++) { ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

find…

public void attackNPCSWithin(int gfx, int maxDamage, int range) {
for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)

change to…
public void attackNPCSWithin(int gfx, int maxDamage, int range) {
for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs - 1; i++)

item.title: HeLP?
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

Ok so i tried to use this new command i added it attacks all npc’s around you with a giant explosion. But when i treid to do it i got this[code]ProjectMoney - Created by MrMoney

Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…done!
Connection from localhost:2799
[client-1-Mrmoney]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 32 ms]
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost)
Connection from localhost:2800
[client-1-Mrmoney]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms]
[client-1-Mrmoney]: playerCommand: explode
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000
at client.attackNPCSWithin(client.java:1660)
at client.customCommand(client.java:3503)
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:10544)
at client.process(client.java:12869)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:283)
at process.run(process.java:23)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
ProjectMoney [fatal] - exception
[client-1-Mrmoney]: Logout
ClientHandler: Client Mrmoney disconnected (localhost)
Connection from localhost:2802
[client-1-Mrmoney]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 16 ms]
[/code]

This is the code i am using[code]if (command.startsWith(“explode”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mrmoney”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“rubiks”)) {

        stillgfx(572, absY, absX); //Hole in ground
        stillgfx(571, absY, absX); //Dust storm
        stillgfx(582, absY+1, absX+1);
        stillgfx(498, absY+4, absX-1); //498 = Fireball
        stillgfx(498, absY-4, absX+1);
        stillgfx(498, absY+1, absX+4);
        stillgfx(498, absY-1, absX-4);
        stillgfx(498, absY, absX-4);

        stillgfx(498, absY-4, absX);
        stillgfx(547, absY+1, absX-1); //547 = Exploding bomb with smoke
        stillgfx(547, absY-1, absX+1);
        stillgfx(547, absY+1, absX+1);
        stillgfx(547, absY-1, absX-1);
        stillgfx(437, absY, absX-1); // 437 = Retribution
        stillgfx(437, absY, absX+1);
        stillgfx(437, absY+1, absX);
        stillgfx(437, absY-1, absX);
        stillgfx(287, absY, absX); // 287 = HUGE Explosion
        stillgfx(287, absY+3, absX);
        stillgfx(287, absY-3, absX);
        stillgfx(287, absY, absX+3);
        stillgfx(287, absY, absX-3);

        stillgfx(287, absY-2, absX+2);

        stillgfx(287, absY-2, absX-2);
        //Flames

        stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX+1);
        stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX+1);
        stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX-1);

        stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX);
        stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX-2);
